instructions.manual_review_required: IMPORTANT: These image selections are TEMPLATE PLACEHOLDERS based on sequential file order. You MUST manually review all source images and update sourcePath values to point to the best quality images for each purpose.

selection_criteria.hero: Wide-angle, dramatic, shows completed work, good composition, 1920px+ width
selection_criteria.featured: Close-up technical detail, clear subject, shows technique/quality
selection_criteria.before: Clear documentation of problem/condition before work
selection_criteria.after: Matching angle to before image, shows completed repair/work
selection_criteria.gallery: Variety of phases, techniques, perspectives - tell project story

instructions.alt_text_guidelines: 50-125 characters, descriptive, include service type and location, avoid 'image of' or 'photo of' prefix
next_steps: 1. Manually review all source images in each project folder
2. Update sourcePath values to point to best images for each purpose
3. Verify alt text is descriptive and SEO-optimized
4. Add remaining 9 projects (Waitara, Kingswood, Zetland, Northbridge, Florence & Capri, Marsden Park 1 & 2, Coles, Toongabie, Jacaranda)
5. Run optimize-images.js to process and optimize all selected images
6. Run copy-project-images.js to copy images to public/images/ directories
7. Run generate-alt-text-suggestions.js to verify alt text coverage
8. Run verify-alt-text.js to ensure all images have proper alt text
